abstract: Missouri Historical Society, which operates Missouri History Museum in St Louis, is asking residents to donate items related to 2014 Ferguson unrest, regardless of whether they sided with the protesters or supported Police Officer Darren Wilson; Juanita Morris, owner of Fashions R Boutique, which was destroyed during protests, is honored to see relics of her store considered as potential museum pieces.
lead_paragraph: Business owners are determined to move forward after protests destroyed storefronts, and the Missouri History Museum wants to keep reminders of what happened.
snippet: Business owners are determined to move forward after protests destroyed storefronts, and the Missouri History Museum wants to keep reminders of what happened.

keywords.value: Fashions R Boutique (Dellwood, Mo, Retail Store)
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Historians Sift the Ruins for Ferguson’s Legacy
headline.print_headline: Historians Sift the Ruins for Ferguson’s Legacy
